code: import React from'react';import BookCard from'./BookCard.js';import"./BookList.css";var BookList=function BookList(props){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"BookList__list"},props.books.map(function(book,i){return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(BookCard,{key:i,image:book.volumeInfo.imageLinks.thumbnail,title:book.volumeInfo.title,description:book.volumeInfo.description});}));};export default BookList;
